verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, cause Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> her abominations <S%H8441><s%>,

And say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Your birth <S%H4351><s%> and your nativity <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3669><s%>; your father <S%H1><s%> was a Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and your mother <S%H517><s%> a Hittite <S%H2850><s%>.

And as for your nativity <S%H4138><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> you were born <S%H3205><s%> your navel <S%H8270><s%> was not cut <S%H3772><s%>, neither were you washed <S%H7364><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to cleanse <S%H4935><s%> you <S%H4414><s%>; you were not salted at all <S%H4414><s%>, nor swaddled <S%H2853><s%> at all <S%H2853><s%>.

No eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, to do any <S%H259><s%> of these unto you <S%H2550><s%>, to have compassion upon you <S%H7993><s%>; but you were cast out in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>, to the loathing <S%H1604><s%> of your person <S%H5315><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were born <S%H3205><s%>.

And when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you <S%H7200><s%>, and saw you covered <S%H947><s%> in your own blood <S%H1818><s%>, I said <S%H559><s%> unto you when you were in your blood <S%H1818><s%>, Live <S%H2421><s%>; Yes <S%H559><s%>, I said unto you when you were in your blood <S%H1818><s%>, Live <S%H2421><s%>.

I have caused <S%H5414><s%> you to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as the bud <S%H6780><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and you have increased <S%H7235><s%> and grown great <S%H1431><s%>, and you have come <S%H935><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornaments <S%H5716><s%>: your breasts <S%H7699><s%> are fashioned <S%H3559><s%>, and your hair <S%H8181><s%> is grown <S%H6779><s%>, where you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you <S%H7200><s%>, and looked upon you <S%H6256><s%>, behold, your time was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%>; and I spread <S%H6566><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over you <S%H3680><s%>, and covered your nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: Yes <S%H7650><s%>, I swore unto you <S%H935><s%>, and entered into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, and you became mine.
Then washed <S%H7364><s%> I you with water <S%H4325><s%>; Yes <S%H7857><s%>, I throughly washed away your blood <S%H1818><s%> from you <S%H5480><s%>, and I anointed you with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> you also with embroidered work <S%H7553><s%>, and shod <S%H5274><s%> you with badgers <S%H8476><s%>' skin, and I dressed <S%H2280><s%> you in fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and I covered <S%H3680><s%> you with silk <S%H4897><s%>.
I decked <S%H5710><s%> you also with ornaments <S%H5716><s%>, and I put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon your hands <S%H3027><s%>, and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on your neck <S%H1627><s%>.

And I put <S%H5414><s%> a jewel <S%H5141><s%> on your forehead <S%H639><s%>, and earrings <S%H5694><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%>, and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> upon your head <S%H7218><s%>.

Thus were you decked <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>; and your clothes <S%H4403><s%> were of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and silk <S%H4897><s%>, and embroidered work <S%H7553><s%>; you did eat <S%H398><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>: and you were exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> beautiful <S%H3302><s%>, and you did prosper <S%H6743><s%> into a kingdom <S%H4410><s%>.

And your renown <S%H8034><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for your beauty <S%H3308><s%>: for it was perfect <S%H3632><s%> through my comeliness <S%H1926><s%>, which I had put <S%H7760><s%> upon you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

But you did trust <S%H982><s%> in your own beauty <S%H3308><s%>, and played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> because of your renown <S%H8034><s%>, and poured out <S%H8210><s%> your fornications <S%H8457><s%> on every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%>; his it was.

And of your garments <S%H899><s%> you did take <S%H3947><s%>, and decked <S%H6213><s%> your high places <S%H1116><s%> with various colors <S%H2921><s%>, and played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> thereupon <S%H935><s%>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You have also taken <S%H3947><s%> your fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver <S%H3701><s%>, which I had given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, and made to yourself images <S%H6754><s%> of men <S%H2145><s%>, and did commit whoredom with them <S%H2181><s%>,

And took <S%H3947><s%> your embroidered <S%H7553><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>: and you have set my oil <S%H8081><s%> and my incense <S%H7004><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>.

My food <S%H3899><s%> also which I gave <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H5560><s%>, fine flour, and oil <S%H8081><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, with which I fed <S%H398><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>, you have even set it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%>: and thus it was <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

Moreover you have taken <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom you have borne <S%H3205><s%> unto me <S%H2076><s%>, and these have you sacrificed unto them to be devoured <S%H398><s%>. Is this of your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> a small matter <S%H4592><s%>,
That you have slain <S%H7819><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them to cause them to pass through the fire for them <S%H5674><s%>?

And in all your abominations <S%H8441><s%> and your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth <S%H5271><s%>, when you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>, and were polluted <S%H947><s%> in your blood <S%H1818><s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> all your wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, (woe <S%H188><s%>, woe <S%H188><s%> unto you says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>;)
That you have also built <S%H1129><s%> unto you an eminent place <S%H1354><s%>, and have made <S%H6213><s%> yourselves a high place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>.

You have built <S%H1129><s%> your high place <S%H7413><s%> at every head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%>, and have made your beauty <S%H3308><s%> to be abhorred <S%H8581><s%>, and have opened <S%H6589><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> to every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>.

You have also committed fornication <S%H2181><s%> with the Egyptians <S%H1121><s%> your neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and have increased <S%H7235><s%> your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%>.

Behold <S%H5186><s%>, therefore I have stretched out my hand <S%H3027><s%> over you <S%H1639><s%>, and have diminished your ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food <S%H5414><s%>, and delivered you unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you <S%H1323><s%>, the daughters of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, which are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of your lewd <S%H2154><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

You have played the whore <S%H2181><s%> also with the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%>, because <S%H1115><s%> you were insatiable <S%H7646><s%>; Yes <S%H2181><s%>, you have played the prostitute with them <S%H7654><s%>, and yet could not be satisfied.

You have moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your fornication <S%H8457><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> unto Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>; and yet you were not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> herewith <S%H2063><s%>.

How weak <S%H535><s%> is your heart <S%H3826><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, seeing you do <S%H6213><s%> all these things <S%H4639><s%>, the work of a imperious <S%H7986><s%> whorish <S%H2181><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>;

In that you build <S%H1129><s%> your eminent place <S%H1354><s%> in the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way <S%H1870><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> your high place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>; and have not been as a prostitute <S%H2181><s%>, in that you scorn <S%H7046><s%> hire <S%H868><s%>;
But as a wife <S%H802><s%> that commits adultery <S%H5003><s%>, which takes <S%H3947><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead of her husband <S%H376><s%>!

They give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all whores <S%H2181><s%>: but you give <S%H5414><s%> your gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all your lovers <S%H157><s%>, and hire <S%H7809><s%> them <S%H935><s%>, that they may come unto you on every side <S%H5439><s%> for your whoredom <S%H8457><s%>.

And you are different <S%H2016><s%> from other women <S%H802><s%> in your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, whereas none follows <S%H310><s%> you to commit whoredoms <S%H2181><s%>: and in that you give <S%H5414><s%> a reward <S%H868><s%>, and no reward <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> unto you <S%H1961><s%>, in that you are different <S%H2016><s%>.
Therefore <S%H2181><s%>, O prostitute, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Because your filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured out <S%H8210><s%>, and your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> through your whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with your lovers <S%H157><s%>, and with all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of your abominations <S%H8441><s%>, and by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, which you did give unto them <S%H5414><s%>;

Behold <S%H6908><s%>, therefore I will gather all your lovers <S%H157><s%>, with whom you have taken pleasure <S%H6149><s%>, and all them that you have loved <S%H157><s%>, with all them that you have hated <S%H8130><s%>; I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> them round about <S%H5439><s%> against you <S%H1540><s%>, and will uncover your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, that they may see all your nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

And I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you <S%H5003><s%>, as women that break wedlock and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged <S%H4941><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you blood <S%H1818><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

And I will also give <S%H5414><s%> you into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall throw down <S%H2040><s%> your eminent place <S%H1354><s%>, and shall break down <S%H5422><s%> your high places <S%H7413><s%>: they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> you also of your clothes <S%H899><s%>, and shall take <S%H3947><s%> your fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%>, and leave <S%H3240><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

They shall also bring up <S%H5927><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> against you <S%H7275><s%>, and they shall stone you with stones <S%H68><s%>, and thrust you through <S%H1333><s%> with their swords <S%H2719><s%>.

And they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women <S%H802><s%>: and I will cause you to cease <S%H7673><s%> from playing the prostitute <S%H2181><s%>, and you also shall give <S%H5414><s%> no hire any more <S%H868><s%>.

So will I make my fury <S%H2534><s%> toward you to rest <S%H5117><s%>, and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from you <S%H8252><s%>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry <S%H3707><s%>.

Because you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth <S%H5271><s%>, but have fretted <S%H7264><s%> me in all these things <S%H1887><s%>; behold, therefore I also will recompense <S%H5414><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> upon your head <S%H7218><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>: and you shall not commit <S%H6213><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> above all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.
Behold <S%H4911><s%>, every one that uses proverbs shall use this proverb <S%H4911><s%> against you <S%H559><s%>, saying, As is the mother <S%H517><s%>, so is her daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

You are your mother <S%H517><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, that loathes <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her sons <S%H1121><s%>; and you are the sister <S%H269><s%> of your sisters <S%H269><s%>, which loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H582><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%>: your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and your father <S%H1><s%> an Amorite <S%H567><s%>.

And your elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, she and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> that live <S%H3427><s%> at your left hand <S%H8040><s%>: and your younger <S%H6996><s%> sister <S%H269><s%>, that dwells <S%H3427><s%> at your right hand <S%H3225><s%>, is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Yet have you not walked <S%H1980><s%> after their ways <S%H1870><s%>, nor done <S%H6213><s%> after their abominations <S%H8441><s%>: but <S%H6985><s%>, as if that were a very little <S%H4592><s%> thing <S%H7843><s%>, you were corrupted more than they <S%H2004><s%> in all your ways <S%H1870><s%>.

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, Sodom <S%H5467><s%> your sister <S%H269><s%> has not done <S%H6213><s%>, she nor her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, as you have done <S%H6213><s%>, you and your daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Behold <S%H5771><s%>, this was the iniquity of your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, pride <S%H1347><s%>, fullness <S%H7653><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and abundance <S%H7962><s%> of idleness <S%H8252><s%> was in her and in her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, neither did she strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>.
And they were haughty <S%H1361><s%>, and committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5493><s%>: therefore I took them away as I saw good <S%H7200><s%>.

Neither has Samaria <S%H8111><s%> committed <S%H2398><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of your sins <S%H2403><s%>; but you have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> more than they <S%H2007><s%>, and have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%> in all your abominations <S%H8441><s%> which you have done <S%H6213><s%>.

You also <S%H6419><s%>, which have judged your sisters <S%H269><s%>, bear <S%H5375><s%> your own shame <S%H3639><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%> that you have committed more abominable <S%H8581><s%> than they <S%H2004><s%>: they are more righteous <S%H6663><s%> than you <S%H954><s%>: Yes, be you confounded also <S%H5375><s%>, and bear your shame <S%H3639><s%>, in that you have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%>.

When I shall bring again <S%H7725><s%> their captivity <S%H7622><s%>, the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, then will I bring again the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of your captives <S%H7622><s%> in the midst of them <S%H8432><s%>:
That you may bear <S%H5375><s%> your own shame <S%H3639><s%>, and may be confounded <S%H3637><s%> in all that you have done <S%H6213><s%>, in that you are a comfort unto them <S%H5162><s%>.

When your sisters <S%H269><s%>, Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate <S%H6927><s%>, and Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate <S%H6927><s%>, then you and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to your former estate <S%H6927><s%>.
For your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> was not mentioned <S%H8052><s%> by your mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your pride <S%H1347><s%>,

Before your wickedness <S%H7451><s%> was discovered <S%H1540><s%>, as at the time <S%H6256><s%> of your reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%>, and all that are round about <S%H5439><s%> her <S%H1323><s%>, the daughters of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, which despise <S%H7590><s%> you round about <S%H5439><s%>.
You have borne <S%H5375><s%> your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your abominations <S%H8441><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; I will even deal <S%H6213><s%> with you as you have done <S%H6213><s%>, which have despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> in breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Nevertheless I will remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you in the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth <S%H5271><s%>, and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> unto you a everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Then you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and be ashamed <S%H3637><s%>, when you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%>, your elder <S%H1419><s%> and your younger <S%H6996><s%>: and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them unto you for daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but not by your covenant <S%H1285><s%>.
And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you <S%H3045><s%>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

That you may remember <S%H2142><s%>, and be confounded <S%H954><s%>, and never open <S%H6610><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> any more because <S%H6440><s%> of your shame <S%H3639><s%>, when I am pacified <S%H3722><s%> toward you for all that you have done <S%H6213><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.
